joint position in radians

simplesect.para: the size is decided at the configuration and remains fixed, and internal checks must be done at the implementation level by the Derived class. This means that the user must pass a resized argument "jointPositions" to this method

time at which the measurement was received

time at which the measurement was received

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::string &imuName, Eigen::Ref< Vector12d > imuMeasurement, OptionalDoubleRef receiveTimeInSeconds={})
memberdef.name: getIMUMeasurement

briefdescription.para: Get IMU measurement The serialization of measurments is as follows, (rpy acc omega mag)

listitem.para: rpy in radians Roll-Pitch-Yaw Euler angles
acc in m/s^2 linear accelerometer measurements

mag in tesla magnetometer measurements
imuName
name of the IMU
imuMeasurement
imu measurement of size 12
receiveTimeInSeconds
time at which the measurement was received
true/false in case of success/failure

briefdescription.para: Helper method to maintain SensorBridgeOptions struct by populating it from the configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: the user may choose to use/not use this method depending on their requirements for the implementation if the user chooses to not use the method, the implementation must simply contain "return true;"

parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
SensorBridgeOptions to hold the bridge options for streaming sensor measurements

memberdef.argsstring: (std::weak_ptr< const ParametersHandler::IParametersHandler > handler, const SensorBridgeOptions &sensorBridgeOptions, SensorLists &sensorLists)
memberdef.name: populateSensorListsFromConfig

briefdescription.para: Helper method to maintain SensorLists struct by populating it from the configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: the user may choose to use/not use this method depending on their requirements for the implementation if the user chooses to not use the method, the implementation must simply contain "return true;"

parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
configured object of SensorBridgeOptions
SensorLists object holding list of connected sensor devices

briefdescription.para: Helper method to maintain SensorBridgeMetaData struct by populating it from the configuration parameters.

simplesect.para: the user may choose to use/not use this method depending on their requirements for the implementation if the user chooses to not use the method, the implementation must simply contain "return true;"

parameterdescription.para: Parameters handler
